stimulusHtml:
Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.


Compare single-member districts in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries. In your response, you should do the following:

  1. Define the concept of “single-member districts.”
  2. Describe two different examples of single-member districts, each one used by a different AP Comparative Government and Politics course country.
  3. Explain how single-member districts promote different party systems for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in (b).
